task: Apply a style to the current file
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the text or paragraph that you want to apply a style to.
On the Home tab, in the Styles group, click the More button (the arrow at the bottom right corner of the Styles group) to open the Styles pane.
In the Styles pane, scroll through the list of styles and click on the style that you want to apply.
The selected text or paragraph will now be formatted according to the chosen style.
